channel.title: Calligraphy on Of Machines and Men
channel.description: Recent content in Calligraphy on Of Machines and Men

item.title: Somerset Art Group Photography Exhibition at YEAST Scrap Store
item.description: Yesterday, there was a photo exhibition by the Somerset Art Group. It is a group started by colleagues and good friends from Seetec-Pluss, and I was invited to help out and exhibit there. The above photos are a collage of my work that was exhibited, alongside many other, more talented, photographers.
